summary: This document outlines the Know Your Customer (KYC) details for Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke in relation to their banking relationship with Deutsche Bank. It includes information about their roles, the purpose of their accounts, and their financial backgrounds.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the President of Gratitude America and is a current client of the bank. He is the sole manager and owner of Zorro Management, LLC.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as a contact person for the accounts and is associated with Jeffrey Epstein in the context of their banking relationship.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is the Relationship Manager at Deutsche Bank who was contacted by Epstein and Indyke to open a checking account.

connections.description: Darren Indyke is associated with Jeffrey Epstein in a professional capacity, likely as his attorney.
Stewart Oldfield is the Relationship Manager for Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Account Opening Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke reached out to Stewart Oldfield to open a checking account for Zorro Management, LLC.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the President of Gratitude America and is a client of Deutsche Bank.
Darren Indyke is identified as an attorney and the primary contact for Epstein's accounts.
Zorro Management, LLC was established to manage the daily expenses of Epstein's business activities.
The document includes KYC details for both Epstein and Indyke, including their financial backgrounds and sources of wealth.
The account for Zorro Management, LLC was opened on December 12, 2016.
